title: Stelisto
author: Stelisto
created_time: September 26, 2022, 03:49:50 AMLast edit: September 26, 2022, 05:22:04 AM by Stelisto
content: Hello,I'm a game developer with an experience in solidity, If anyone has a blockchain game project,  I'm available, and I can make a prototype for your idea, cinematic, or the complete project, If anyone is interested let me know asap.my fees:Game prototype: from 500 USD to 2000 USD.Trailer video: 3000 USD to 10K.Complete game with multiplayer/contract supports: start from 25k. Prices are not final, it depends on the game.

comments.author: cryptoaddictchie
comments.body: I think you should move this thread to altcoins service discussion/announcement since you are posting for a service which of related to altcoin right? Not sure though of this will be allowed on service section too.Goodluck to your hunt for blockchain projects.
